content: Relax! I can make everybody Immortal in less than a month. We humans can stop aging (by wiping out all diseases) and live forever (like our Creators from the planet of Nibiru -The Anunnaki). I got the key to our Biological Immortality. By staying absolutely healthy all the time. By doing my discovery (just an exercise for a minute a day). My WVCD. The Weapon of Virus and Cancer Destruction, that cures and prevents any diseases, known on Earth for millions of years, even radiation disease. I will describe my WVCD to everyone, who sends me a check for one million bucks. Everybody will stay absolutely healthy all the time, living their Endless Lives, for Infinite Health = Immortality.
